footer_description: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer and science enthusiast. I have completed a level 8 Higher Diploma on Web Development from NCI Dublin with 1st Class Honours. Plus, I have studied courses on web design and front-end web development from IBAT College Dublin. Currently, I am based in Malaga and job-seeking.
